name: Spellgear
description: Non-target action role-playing game, with MOBA and MOBA-style arenas, an open world to explore and relax, a fresh and unique combat system, and many other exciting features.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7,8,8.1,10,Vista,XP Processor: 2 cores Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4000, NVidia GT220, AMD HD 6450 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7,8,8.1,10 Processor: 4 cores, 2.5Ghz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX660, AMD HD7850 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
